GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v6.0.7
GSD.description:
ARC: mm: fix leakage of memory allocated for PTE

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.7 by commit d83a69966e8b6ae9dd447f3ac704c0223bceb7f7, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit d9820ff76f95fa26d33e412254a89cd65b23142d. For more details please see the references link.
